response.overview: On January 31st, 2020 The band known as G.O.O.N. played their 2019 album, Natural Evil, at 7th Circle in Denver, Colorado. This is the only time the album has or ever will be played in its entirety! One year later, the footage was found, and released by convulse records. What you are about to see is real, raw, and 69% hardcore.
response.tagline: WARNING THIS FILM HAS NOT BEEN RATED BECAUSE OF ITS BRUTAL AND EXPLICIT DEPICTIONS OF ACTUAL DEATH. THE CONTENT AND SUBJECT MATTER MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR THOSE UNDER 18, THOSE WITH WEAK HEARTS AND THOSE OF DELICATE NATURE.
response.title: Goon Natural Evil Live
